001package squidpony.squidai;
002
003import squidpony.squidgrid.Measurement;
004import squidpony.squidgrid.Radius;
005import squidpony.squidgrid.Spill;
006import squidpony.squidmath.*;
007
008import java.io.Serializable;
009import java.util.ArrayList;
010import java.util.Arrays;
011import java.util.Collection;
012
013import static squidpony.squidgrid.Measurement.*;
014
015/**
016 * An AOE type that has a center and a volume, and will randomly expand in all directions until it reaches volume or
017 * cannot expand further. Specify the RadiusType as Radius.DIAMOND for Manhattan distance (and the best results),
018 * RADIUS.SQUARE for Chebyshev, or RADIUS.CIRCLE for Euclidean. You can specify a seed for the RNG and a fresh RNG will
019 * be used for all random expansion; the RNG will reset to the specified seed after each generation so the same
020 * CloudAOE can be used in different places by just changing the center. You can cause the CloudAOE to not reset after
021 * generating each time by using setExpanding(true) and cause it to reset after the next generation by setting it back
022 * to the default of false. If expanding is true, then multiple calls to findArea with the same center and larger
023 * volumes will produce more solid clumps of affected area with fewer gaps, and can be spaced out over multiple calls.
024 * <br>
025 * This will produce doubles for its {@link #findArea()} method which are equal to 1.0.
026 *
027 * This class uses {@link squidpony.squidgrid.Spill} to create its area of effect.
028 * Created by Tommy Ettinger on 7/13/2015.
029 */
030public class CloudAOE implements AOE, Serializable {
031    private static final long serialVersionUID = 2L;
032    private Spill spill;
033    private Coord center, origin = null;
034    private int volume;
035    private long seed;
036    private boolean expanding;
037    private Radius rt;
038    private Reach reach = new Reach(1, 1, Radius.SQUARE, AimLimit.FREE);
039    private char[][] dungeon;
040
041    public CloudAOE(Coord center, int volume, Radius radiusType)
042    {
043        GWTRNG rng = new GWTRNG();
044        seed = rng.getState();
045        spill = new Spill(rng);
046        this.center = center;
047        this.volume = volume;
048        expanding = false;
049        rt = radiusType;
050        switch (radiusType)
051        {
052            case SPHERE:
053            case CIRCLE:
054                spill.measurement = EUCLIDEAN;
055                break;
056            case CUBE:
057            case SQUARE:
058                spill.measurement = CHEBYSHEV;
059                break;
060            default:
061                spill.measurement = MANHATTAN;
062                break;
063        }
064    }
065
066    public CloudAOE(Coord center, int volume, Radius radiusType, int minRange, int maxRange)
067    {
068        GWTRNG rng = new GWTRNG();
069        seed = rng.getState();
070        spill = new Spill(rng);
071        this.center = center;
072        this.volume = volume;
073        expanding = false;
074        rt = radiusType;
075        reach.minDistance = minRange;
076        reach.maxDistance = maxRange;
077        switch (radiusType)
078        {
079            case SPHERE:
080            case CIRCLE:
081                spill.measurement = EUCLIDEAN;
082                break;
083            case CUBE:
084            case SQUARE:
085                spill.measurement = CHEBYSHEV;
086                break;
087            default:
088                spill.measurement = MANHATTAN;
089                break;
090        }
091    }
092    public CloudAOE(Coord center, int volume, Radius radiusType, long rngSeed)
093    {
094        seed = rngSeed;
095        spill = new Spill(new GWTRNG(rngSeed));
096        this.center = center;
097        this.volume = volume;
098        expanding = false;
099        rt = radiusType;
100        switch (radiusType)
101        {
102            case SPHERE:
103            case CIRCLE:
104                spill.measurement = EUCLIDEAN;
105                break;
106            case CUBE:
107            case SQUARE:
108                spill.measurement = CHEBYSHEV;
109                break;
110            default:
111                spill.measurement = MANHATTAN;
112                break;
113        }
114    }
115    public CloudAOE(Coord center, int volume, Radius radiusType, long rngSeed, int minRange, int maxRange)
116    {
117        seed = rngSeed;
118        spill = new Spill(new GWTRNG(rngSeed));
119        this.center = center;
120        this.volume = volume;
121        expanding = false;
122        rt = radiusType;
123        switch (radiusType)
124        {
125            case SPHERE:
126            case CIRCLE:
127                spill.measurement = EUCLIDEAN;
128                break;
129            case CUBE:
130            case SQUARE:
131                spill.measurement = CHEBYSHEV;
132                break;
133            default:
134                spill.measurement = MANHATTAN;
135                break;
136        }
137        reach.minDistance = minRange;
138        reach.maxDistance = maxRange;
139    }
140
141    public Coord getCenter() {
142        return center;
143    }
144
145    public void setCenter(Coord center) {
146
147        if (dungeon != null && center.isWithin(dungeon.length, dungeon[0].length) &&
148                AreaUtils.verifyReach(reach, origin, center))
149        {
150            this.center = center;
151        }
152    }
153
154    public int getVolume() {
155        return volume;
156    }
157
158    public void setVolume(int volume) {
159        this.volume = volume;
160    }
161
162    public Radius getRadiusType() {
163        return rt;
164    }
165
166    public void setRadiusType(Radius radiusType) {
167        rt = radiusType;
168        switch (radiusType)
169        {
170            case SPHERE:
171            case CIRCLE:
172                break;
173            case CUBE:
174            case SQUARE:
175                break;
176            default:
177                break;
178        }
179    }
180
181    @Override
182    public void shift(Coord aim) {
183        setCenter(aim);
184    }
185
186    @Override
187    public boolean mayContainTarget(Collection<Coord> targets) {
188        for (Coord p : targets)
189        {
190            if(rt.radius(center.x, center.y, p.x, p.y) <= Math.sqrt(volume) * 0.75)
191                return true;
192        }
193        return false;
194    }
195
196    @Override
197    public OrderedMap<Coord, ArrayList<Coord>> idealLocations(Collection<Coord> targets, Collection<Coord> requiredExclusions) {
198        if(targets == null)
199            return new OrderedMap<>();
200        if(requiredExclusions == null) requiredExclusions = new OrderedSet<>();
201
202        //requiredExclusions.remove(origin);
203        int totalTargets = targets.size();
204        OrderedMap<Coord, ArrayList<Coord>> bestPoints = new OrderedMap<>(totalTargets * 8);
205
206        if(totalTargets == 0 || volume <= 0)
207            return bestPoints;
208
209        if(volume == 1)
210        {
211            for(Coord p : targets)
212            {
213                ArrayList<Coord> ap = new ArrayList<>();
214                ap.add(p);
215                bestPoints.put(p, ap);
216            }
217            return bestPoints;
218        }
219        Coord[] ts = targets.toArray(new Coord[targets.size()]);
220        Coord[] exs = requiredExclusions.toArray(new Coord[requiredExclusions.size()]);
221        Coord t;
222
223        double[][][] compositeMap = new double[ts.length][dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
224
225        Spill sp;
226
227        char[][] dungeonCopy = new char[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
228        for (int i = 0; i < dungeon.length; i++) {
229            System.arraycopy(dungeon[i], 0, dungeonCopy[i], 0, dungeon[i].length);
230        }
231
232        Coord tempPt;
233        for (int i = 0; i < exs.length; ++i) {
234            t = exs[i];
235            sp = new Spill(dungeon, spill.measurement);
236            sp.rng.setState(seed);
237
238            sp.start(t, volume, null);
239            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
240                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
241                    tempPt = Coord.get(x, y);
242                    dungeonCopy[x][y] = (sp.spillMap[x][y] || !AreaUtils.verifyReach(reach, origin, tempPt)) ? '!' : dungeonCopy[x][y];
243                }
244            }
245        }
246
247        Measurement dmm = Measurement.MANHATTAN;
248        if(spill.measurement == CHEBYSHEV) dmm = Measurement.CHEBYSHEV;
249        else if(spill.measurement == EUCLIDEAN) dmm = Measurement.EUCLIDEAN;
250
251        double radius = Math.sqrt(volume) * 0.75;
252
253        for (int i = 0; i < ts.length; ++i) {
254            DijkstraMap dm = new DijkstraMap(dungeon, dmm);
255
256            t = ts[i];
257            sp = new Spill(dungeon, spill.measurement);
258            sp.rng.setState(seed);
259
260            sp.start(t, volume, null);
261
262            double dist = 0.0;
263            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
264                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
265                    if (sp.spillMap[x][y]){
266                        dist = reach.metric.radius(origin.x, origin.y, x, y);
267                        if(dist <= reach.maxDistance + radius && dist >= reach.minDistance - radius)
268                            compositeMap[i][x][y] = dm.physicalMap[x][y];
269                        else
270                            compositeMap[i][x][y] = DijkstraMap.WALL;
271                    }
272                    else compositeMap[i][x][y] = DijkstraMap.WALL;
273                }
274            }
275            if(compositeMap[i][ts[i].x][ts[i].y] > DijkstraMap.FLOOR)
276            {
277                for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
278                    Arrays.fill(compositeMap[i][x], 99999.0);
279                }
280                continue;
281            }
282
283            dm.initialize(compositeMap[i]);
284            dm.setGoal(t);
285            dm.scan(null, null);
286            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
287                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
288                    compositeMap[i][x][y] = (dm.gradientMap[x][y] < DijkstraMap.FLOOR  && dungeonCopy[x][y] != '!') ? dm.gradientMap[x][y] : 99999.0;
289                }
290            }
291            dm.resetMap();
292            dm.clearGoals();
293        }
294        double bestQuality = 99999 * ts.length;
295        double[][] qualityMap = new double[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
296        for (int x = 0; x < qualityMap.length; x++) {
297            for (int y = 0; y < qualityMap[x].length; y++) {
298                qualityMap[x][y] = 0.0;
299                long bits = 0;
300                for (int i = 0; i < ts.length; ++i) {
301                    qualityMap[x][y] += compositeMap[i][x][y];
302                    if(compositeMap[i][x][y] < 99999.0 && i < 63)
303                        bits |= 1 << i;
304                }
305                if(qualityMap[x][y] < bestQuality)
306                {
307                    ArrayList<Coord> ap = new ArrayList<>();
308
309                    for (int i = 0; i < ts.length && i < 63; ++i) {
310                        if((bits & (1 << i)) != 0)
311                            ap.add(ts[i]);
312                    }
313
314                    if(ap.size() > 0) {
315                        bestQuality = qualityMap[x][y];
316                        bestPoints.clear();
317                        bestPoints.put(Coord.get(x, y), ap);
318                    }
319                }
320                else if(qualityMap[x][y] == bestQuality)
321                {
322                    ArrayList<Coord> ap = new ArrayList<>();
323
324                    for (int i = 0; i < ts.length && i < 63; ++i) {
325                        if((bits & (1 << i)) != 0)
326                            ap.add(ts[i]);
327                    }
328
329                    if (ap.size() > 0) {
330                        bestPoints.put(Coord.get(x, y), ap);
331                    }
332                }
333            }
334        }
335
336        return bestPoints;
337    }
338
339    @Override
340    public OrderedMap<Coord, ArrayList<Coord>> idealLocations(Collection<Coord> priorityTargets, Collection<Coord> lesserTargets, Collection<Coord> requiredExclusions) {
341        if(priorityTargets == null)
342            return idealLocations(lesserTargets, requiredExclusions);
343        if(requiredExclusions == null) requiredExclusions = new OrderedSet<>();
344
345        //requiredExclusions.remove(origin);
346
347        int totalTargets = priorityTargets.size() + lesserTargets.size();
348        OrderedMap<Coord, ArrayList<Coord>> bestPoints = new OrderedMap<>(totalTargets * 8);
349
350        if(totalTargets == 0 || volume <= 0)
351            return bestPoints;
352
353        if(volume == 1)
354        {
355            for(Coord p : priorityTargets)
356            {
357                ArrayList<Coord> ap = new ArrayList<>();
358                ap.add(p);
359                bestPoints.put(p, ap);
360            }
361            return bestPoints;
362        }
363        Coord[] pts = priorityTargets.toArray(new Coord[priorityTargets.size()]);
364        Coord[] lts = lesserTargets.toArray(new Coord[lesserTargets.size()]);
365        Coord[] exs = requiredExclusions.toArray(new Coord[requiredExclusions.size()]);
366        Coord t;
367
368        double[][][] compositeMap = new double[totalTargets][dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
369        Spill sp;
370
371        char[][] dungeonCopy = new char[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length],
372                dungeonPriorities = new char[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
373        for (int i = 0; i < dungeon.length; i++) {
374            System.arraycopy(dungeon[i], 0, dungeonCopy[i], 0, dungeon[i].length);
375            Arrays.fill(dungeonPriorities[i], '#');
376        }
377        Coord tempPt = Coord.get(0, 0);
378        for (int i = 0; i < exs.length; ++i) {
379            t = exs[i];
380            sp = new Spill(dungeon, spill.measurement);
381            sp.rng.setState(seed);
382
383            sp.start(t, volume, null);
384            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
385                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
386                    tempPt = Coord.get(x, y);
387                    dungeonCopy[x][y] = (sp.spillMap[x][y] || !AreaUtils.verifyReach(reach, origin, tempPt)) ? '!' : dungeonCopy[x][y];
388                }
389            }
390        }
391
392        t = pts[0];
393
394        Measurement dmm = Measurement.MANHATTAN;
395        if(spill.measurement == CHEBYSHEV) dmm = Measurement.CHEBYSHEV;
396        else if(spill.measurement == EUCLIDEAN) dmm = Measurement.EUCLIDEAN;
397
398        double radius = Math.sqrt(volume) * 0.75;
399
400        for (int i = 0; i < pts.length; ++i) {
401            DijkstraMap dm = new DijkstraMap(dungeon, dmm);
402
403            t = pts[i];
404            sp = new Spill(dungeon, spill.measurement);
405            sp.rng.setState(seed);
406
407            sp.start(t, volume, null);
408
409
410
411            double dist = 0.0;
412            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
413                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
414                    if (sp.spillMap[x][y]){
415                        dist = reach.metric.radius(origin.x, origin.y, x, y);
416                        if(dist <= reach.maxDistance + radius && dist >= reach.minDistance - radius) {
417                            compositeMap[i][x][y] = dm.physicalMap[x][y];
418                            dungeonPriorities[x][y] = dungeon[x][y];
419                        }
420                        else
421                            compositeMap[i][x][y] = DijkstraMap.WALL;
422                    }
423                    else compositeMap[i][x][y] = DijkstraMap.WALL;
424                }
425            }
426            if(compositeMap[i][pts[i].x][pts[i].y] > DijkstraMap.FLOOR)
427            {
428                for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
429                    Arrays.fill(compositeMap[i][x], 399999.0);
430                }
431                continue;
432            }
433
434
435            dm.initialize(compositeMap[i]);
436            dm.setGoal(t);
437            dm.scan(null, null);
438            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
439                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
440                    compositeMap[i][x][y] = (dm.gradientMap[x][y] < DijkstraMap.FLOOR  && dungeonCopy[x][y] != '!') ? dm.gradientMap[x][y] : 399999.0;
441                }
442            }
443            dm.resetMap();
444            dm.clearGoals();
445        }
446
447        t = lts[0];
448
449        for (int i = pts.length; i < totalTargets; ++i) {
450            DijkstraMap dm = new DijkstraMap(dungeon, dmm);
451
452            t = lts[i - pts.length];
453            sp = new Spill(dungeon, spill.measurement);
454            sp.rng.setState(seed);
455
456            sp.start(t, volume, null);
457
458
459            double dist = 0.0;
460            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
461                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
462                    if (sp.spillMap[x][y]){
463                        dist = reach.metric.radius(origin.x, origin.y, x, y);
464                        if(dist <= reach.maxDistance + radius && dist >= reach.minDistance - radius)
465                            compositeMap[i][x][y] = dm.physicalMap[x][y];
466                        else
467                            compositeMap[i][x][y] = DijkstraMap.WALL;
468                    }
469                    else compositeMap[i][x][y] = DijkstraMap.WALL;
470                }
471            }
472            if(compositeMap[i][lts[i - pts.length].x][lts[i - pts.length].y] > DijkstraMap.FLOOR)
473            {
474                for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++)
475                {
476                    Arrays.fill(compositeMap[i][x], 99999.0);
477                }
478                continue;
479            }
480
481
482            dm.initialize(compositeMap[i]);
483            dm.setGoal(t);
484            dm.scan(null, null);
485            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
486                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
487                    compositeMap[i][x][y] = (dm.gradientMap[x][y] < DijkstraMap.FLOOR  && dungeonCopy[x][y] != '!' && dungeonPriorities[x][y] != '#') ? dm.gradientMap[x][y] : 99999.0;
488                }
489            }
490            dm.resetMap();
491            dm.clearGoals();
492        }
493        double bestQuality = 99999 * lts.length + 399999 * pts.length;
494        double[][] qualityMap = new double[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
495        for (int x = 0; x < qualityMap.length; x++) {
496            for (int y = 0; y < qualityMap[x].length; y++) {
497                qualityMap[x][y] = 0.0;
498                long pbits = 0, lbits = 0;
499                for (int i = 0; i < pts.length; ++i) {
500                    qualityMap[x][y] += compositeMap[i][x][y];
501                    if(compositeMap[i][x][y] < 399999.0 && i < 63)
502                        pbits |= 1 << i;
503                }
504                for (int i = pts.length; i < totalTargets; ++i) {
505                    qualityMap[x][y] += compositeMap[i][x][y];
506                    if(compositeMap[i][x][y] < 99999.0 && i < 63)
507                        lbits |= 1 << i;
508                }
509                if(qualityMap[x][y] < bestQuality)
510                {
511                    ArrayList<Coord> ap = new ArrayList<>();
512
513                    for (int i = 0; i < pts.length && i < 63; ++i) {
514                        if((pbits & (1 << i)) != 0)
515                            ap.add(pts[i]);
516                    }
517                    for (int i = pts.length; i < totalTargets && i < 63; ++i) {
518                        if((lbits & (1 << i)) != 0)
519                            ap.add(lts[i - pts.length]);
520                    }
521
522                    if(ap.size() > 0) {
523                        bestQuality = qualityMap[x][y];
524                        bestPoints.clear();
525                        bestPoints.put(Coord.get(x, y), ap);
526                    }
527                }
528                else if(qualityMap[x][y] == bestQuality)
529                {
530                    ArrayList<Coord> ap = new ArrayList<>();
531
532                    for (int i = 0; i < pts.length && i < 63; ++i) {
533                        if((pbits & (1 << i)) != 0)
534                            ap.add(pts[i]);
535                    }
536                    for (int i = pts.length; i < totalTargets && i < 63; ++i) {
537                        if ((pbits & (1 << i)) != 0) {
538                            ap.add(pts[i]);
539                            ap.add(pts[i]);
540                            ap.add(pts[i]);
541                            ap.add(pts[i]);
542                        }
543                    }
544
545                    if (ap.size() > 0) {
546                        bestPoints.put(Coord.get(x, y), ap);
547                    }
548                }
549            }
550        }
551
552        return bestPoints;
553    }

557    @Override
558    public ArrayList<ArrayList<Coord>> idealLocations(Set<Coord> targets, Set<Coord> requiredExclusions) {
559        int totalTargets = targets.size() + 1;
560        int radius = Math.max(1, (int) (Math.sqrt(volume) * 1.5));
561        ArrayList<ArrayList<Coord>> locs = new ArrayList<ArrayList<Coord>>(totalTargets);
562
563        for(int i = 0; i < totalTargets; i++)
564        {
565            locs.add(new ArrayList<Coord>(volume));
566        }
567        if(totalTargets == 1)
568            return locs;
569        double ctr = 0;
570        if(radius < 1)
571        {
572            locs.get(totalTargets - 2).addAll(targets);
573            return locs;
574        }
575        double tempRad;
576        boolean[][] tested = new boolean[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
577        for (int x = 1; x < dungeon.length - 1; x += radius) {
578            BY_POINT:
579            for (int y = 1; y < dungeon[x].length - 1; y += radius) {
580                for(Coord ex : requiredExclusions)
581                {
582                    if(rt.radius(x, y, ex.x, ex.y) <= radius * 0.75)
583                        continue BY_POINT;
584                }

586                for(Coord tgt : targets)
587                {

589                    if(tempRad < radius)
590                        ctr += 1.0 - (tempRad / radius) * 0.5;
591                }
592                if(ctr >= 1)
593                    locs.get((int)(totalTargets - ctr)).add(Coord.get(x, y));
594            }
595        }
596        Coord it;
597        for(int t = 0; t < totalTargets - 1; t++)
598        {
599            if(locs.get(t).size() > 0) {
600                int numPoints = locs.get(t).size();
601                for (int i = 0; i < numPoints; i++) {
602                    it = locs.get(t).get(i);
603                    for (int x = Math.max(1, it.x - radius / 2); x < it.x + (radius + 1) / 2 && x < dungeon.length - 1; x++) {
604                        BY_POINT:
605                        for (int y = Math.max(1, it.y - radius / 2); y <= it.y + (radius - 1) / 2 && y < dungeon[0].length - 1; y++)
606                        {
607                            if(tested[x][y])
608                                continue;
609                            tested[x][y] = true;
610
611                            for(Coord ex : requiredExclusions)
612                            {
613                                if(rt.radius(x, y, ex.x, ex.y) <= radius * 0.75)
614                                    continue BY_POINT;
615                            }
616
617                            ctr = 0;
618                            for(Coord tgt : targets)
619                            {
620                                tempRad = rt.radius(x, y, tgt.x, tgt.y);
621                                if(tempRad < radius)
622                                    ctr += 1.0 - (tempRad / radius) * 0.5;
623                            }
624                            if(ctr >= 1)
625                                locs.get((int)(totalTargets - ctr)).add(Coord.get(x, y));
626                        }
627                    }
628                }
629            }
630        }
631        return locs;
632    }
633*/
634
635    @Override
636    public void setMap(char[][] map) {
637        spill.initialize(map);
638        dungeon = map;
639    }
640
641    @Override
642    public OrderedMap<Coord, Double> findArea() {
643        spill.start(center, volume, null);
644        OrderedMap<Coord, Double> r = AreaUtils.arrayToHashMap(spill.spillMap);
645        if(!expanding)
646        {
647            spill.reset();
648            spill.rng.setState(seed);
649        }
650        return r;
651    }
652
653    @Override
654    public Coord getOrigin() {
655        return origin;
656    }
657
658    @Override
659    public void setOrigin(Coord origin) {
660        this.origin = origin;
661
662    }
663
664    @Override
665    public AimLimit getLimitType() {
666        return reach.limit;
667    }
668
669    @Override
670    public int getMinRange() {
671        return reach.minDistance;
672    }
673
674    @Override
675    public int getMaxRange() {
676        return reach.maxDistance;
677    }
678
679    @Override
680    public Radius getMetric() {
681        return reach.metric;
682    }
683
684    /**
685     * Gets the same values returned by getLimitType(), getMinRange(), getMaxRange(), and getMetric() bundled into one
686     * Reach object.
687     *
688     * @return a non-null Reach object.
689     */
690    @Override
691    public Reach getReach() {
692        return reach;
693    }
694
695    @Override
696    public void setLimitType(AimLimit limitType) {
697        reach.limit = limitType;
698
699    }
700
701    @Override
702    public void setMinRange(int minRange) {
703        reach.minDistance = minRange;
704    }
705
706    @Override
707    public void setMaxRange(int maxRange) {
708        reach.maxDistance = maxRange;
709
710    }
711
712    @Override
713    public void setMetric(Radius metric) {
714        reach.metric = metric;
715    }
716
717    /**
718     * Sets the same values as setLimitType(), setMinRange(), setMaxRange(), and setMetric() using one Reach object.
719     *
720     * @param reach a non-null Reach object.
721     */
722    @Override
723    public void setReach(Reach reach) {
724        if(reach != null)
725            this.reach = reach;
726    }
727
728    public boolean isExpanding() {
729        return expanding;
730    }
731
732    public void setExpanding(boolean expanding) {
733        this.expanding = expanding;
734    }
735
736}
